org.jboss.elemento

Interface HtmlContent<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement,B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IsElement<E>, TextContent<E,B>, TypedBuilder<E,B>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlContentBuilder

    public interface HtmlContent<E extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement,B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>>
extends TextContent<E,B>
    Builder for container-like elements with inner HTML.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default B add(IsElement<?> element)
      Adds the given element by calling element.element().
      default B add(elemental2.dom.Node element)
      Adds the given node.
      default B add(String text)
      Adds the given text as a text node.
      default B addAll(elemental2.dom.Element... elements)
      Adds all elements.
      default B addAll(elemental2.dom.HTMLElement... elements)
      Adds all HTML elements.
      default <F extends elemental2.dom.HTMLElement>
      B      		 addAll(IsElement<?>... elements)
      Adds all elements.
      default B addAll(Iterable<?> elements)
      Adds all elements.
      default B addAll(elemental2.dom.Node... nodes)
      Adds all nodes.
      default B innerHtml(org.gwtproject.safehtml.shared.SafeHtml html)
      Modifies the inner HTML on the element using Element.innerHTML.
